title: Callouts Test

Some intro text.

> [!note] Important Note
> This is a note callout.
> It has multiple lines.

Regular text between callouts.

> [!warning]
> This warning has no custom title.

Some text here.

> [!tip] Pro Tip
> Single line tip.

More text.

> [!danger] Critical Warning
> Be very careful here!
> This is dangerous.

Another paragraph.

> [!info] Information
> Some useful information.
> With more details.

End of document.
